mapper.select:
select a.* from BI_TRANSFORM_SIGN_PARAM a
and a.SIGNGUID=#SIGNGUID# and a.PARAMNAME=#PARAMNAME# and a.DATENAME=#DATENAME# and a.GUID=#GUID# and a.SOURCE=#SOURCE#
order by a.createtime
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO BI_TRANSFORM_SIGN_PARAM ( guid, signGuid, PARAMNAME, DATENAME, SOURCE, sealname, createtime, createuserguid, updatetime, updateuserguid
) select #GUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #SIGNGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #PARAMNAME:VARCHAR:NULL#, #DATENAME:VARCHAR:NULL#, #SOURCE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #SEALNAME:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #CREATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #UPDATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#
mapper.update:
UPDATE BI_TRANSFORM_SIGN_PARAM
updatetime=#CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, updateuserguid=#UPDATEUSERGUID#, SIGNGUID=#SIGNGUID#, DATENAME=#DATENAME#, PARAMNAME=#PARAMNAME#, SOURCE=#SOURCE#, SEALNAME=#SEALNAME#,
WHERE guid = #GUID#
